original_title: The Fable of the Busy Business Boy and the Droppers-in
overview: The Busy Business Boy lands at his desk like the Early Bird with the intention of tearing off a week or two of correspondence in an hour or so. But the Napoleon of finance reckons not with the Man with the Funny Puzzle, the Fruit Vender, the Insurance Agent with the Flowing Vocabulary, and last, but not least, with Rube.
title: The Fable of the Busy Business Boy and the Droppers-in
